description: nova-manage provides a way to specify a destination version for the database, but internally only upgrades are allowed. Downgrades cause exception to be displayed.
title: database schema cannot be downgraded

comments.content: nova-manage provides a way to specify a destination version for the database, but internally only upgrades are allowed. Downgrades cause exception to be displayed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~stanislaw-pitucha

commit eed546053ae89241d730ba84f8c3ce0c89a7d0aa
Author: Stanislaw Pitucha <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 21 14:10:39 2011 +0100

    Allow db schema downgrades
    
    When a destination version is specified, check the current version and allow
    downgrading the schema. Fixes bug 865357.
    
    Change-Id: I47104158884421de92f50322a72243c170a4f1ad
